  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets) 
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728", "USC00519397", "USS0023B17S"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2017-01-01",
    date_max = "2017-12-31") %>%
  mutate(
    name = recode(
      id, 
      USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY", 
      USC00519397 = "Waikiki_HA",
      USS0023B17S = "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10,
    month = lubridate::floor_date(date, unit = "month")) %>%
  select(name, id, everything())
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~tmin, y = ~tmax, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", 
    color = ~name, text = ~date, alpha = 0.5
  )
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
weather_df %>%
  group_by(name, month) %>%
  summarize(mean_tmax = mean(tmax)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~month, y = ~mean_tmax, color = ~name,
          mode = "lines + markers")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month) %>% 
  summarise(mean_prcp = mean(prcp)) %>% 
  filter(name == "CentralPark_NY") %>% 
  mutate(
    month = as.factor(month),
    month = fct_reorder(month, mean_prcp)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~month, y = ~mean_prcp, color = ~month,
          type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
